title: GangPlank
body: So I want GP before the free skin giveaway but I dont own him. And I cant buy him. Sooo no skin for me or....?

replies.body: He'll be re-enabled with the new patch (5.15) tomorrow. :] You'll have plenty of time to buy/play him before the event ends on the 10th!
im the one who wont get it cuz i broke rules and suspended for 10 days :( i deserve it tho. hope you can buy the GP skin tho.

> [{quoted}](name=ZombieNinja War,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=d00vWikI,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-04T19:24:55.888+0000)
>
> im the one who wont get it cuz i broke rules and suspended for 10 days :( i deserve it tho. hope you can buy the GP skin tho.

Thank you for telling me that worthless not even sad story

"Hope you can buy the Gp skin tho."

Way to be a rude-ass OP. Thank the guy for offering you some damn sentiment.

> [{quoted}](name=Summoner Ezraqel,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=d00vWikI,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-05T05:02:49.306+0000)
>
> "Hope you can buy the Gp skin tho."
> 
> Way to be a rude-ass OP. Thank the guy for offering you some damn sentiment.

I really dont care. I had already got my answer and I am going to get it. your responce was simply a waste of time
